strings.Value: "So, how does it feel to be chieftain?"
"How do you manage the ghost in your sword?"
"{g|Tiger Lords}Tiger Lords{/g}! Look who it is! A {d|c41 Chief Armag}friend{/d} to Armag, a friend to the whole tribe! A friend who's always welcome here!"
{n}Armag's wandering eyes stop on your face for a moment, and he firmly shakes your hand.{/n} "{d|c41 Chief Armag}Greetings{/d}, {mf|brother|sister}."
"Armag failed his brothers and sisters, but they took him in again. Armag would rather die than betray their trust again. And they know it."

"It fills Armag's days with doubts and his nights with nightmares. Each day is a battle, when it is around. It is Armag's curse, but it also gives Armag the strength to win. The dead man will never prevail again."
"The tigers are licking their wounds. Much time will pass before the tribe can regain its former power and glory. But that day will come!"
